metadata.title: CVE-2023-28160 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When following a redirect to a publicly accessible web extension file, theURL may have been translated to the actual local path, leaking potentiallysensitive information. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 111.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
